from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType


@udf(returnType=IntegerType())
def cz_sas_br_s_genorm_werkaanb_exclmatch(
    werkaanbod_type_code, werkaanbod_soort_code, aantal
):
    if werkaanbod_type_code == 4 and werkaanbod_soort_code in {
        "14",
        "21",
        "27",
        "28",
        "29",
        "30",
        "31",
        "32",
        "36",
        "38",
        "40",
        "41",
    }:
        return aantal
    if werkaanbod_type_code != 4:
        return aantal
    return 0
